txt.en: The Uruk-hai of Sharmokal grow bolder every day. As their numbers increase, so does their propensity for violence.
Mayor Eirlys Dringarth has asked you to defeat foes at Sharmokal.\n\nSharmokal is in southern Swanfleet.

'Oh, hullo! My name is Eirlys Dringarth - Mayor of Lintrev! Well, yes, we are but a small village. Even so - I take my duties very seriously, and there is some very serious danger afoot!\n\n'From my watch-tower, I can see out for miles and miles. To the east, a fearsome foe has dug into the cliffs, building fortresses and huge spiked walls! Of late, the air has been filled with smoke in that direction. Their bonfires are so many that I fear for our little village! I do not wish to alarm my neighbours, but perhaps you could do something about this? They are very nearly on our doorsteps!'
You should let Eirlys Dringarth know that you have defeated many foes at Sharmokal.\n\nEirlys is in Lintrev.

'You return! How did you fare?'

You recount your deeds.

'Goodness me, that is impressive! Why, I think you may have just saved our village! You have my eternal thanks!'
